entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening then southwest 60 gusting to 90 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
